short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates simple copy/paste list of your available times from Google Calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generates a simple copy/paste list of your available times from your Google Calendar - even simpler than Calendly or similar scheduling tools. 

Writing an email and need to offer times for a call? Don't spend time looking through your calendar, or trading emails back-and-forth to negotiate what times work. 

Instead, just click on Calvailable, choose the length of your meeting, and it will check your calendar for all available time slots so you can copy/paste them in immediately! 

Choose how far out to show times for, whether to include weekends, and also takes into account your working hours so you don't accidentally propose meetings before or after you want to.

Great for when your recipients are intimidated by more elaborate scheduling links such as Calendly.
